TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INamespacePrefixLookup

summary.span: 表示服務，這個服務可以將 XAML 命名空間對應的建議前置詞傳回給消費者。

span.span: Represents a service that can return the recommended prefix for a XAML namespace mapping to consumers.

summary.span: 消費者可能包括設計環境或序列化程式。

span.span: Consumers might include design environments or serializers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此介面代表服務會傳回特定的 XAML 命名空間的前置詞。This interface represents the service that returns the prefix for a particular XAML namespace. 一種技術報告的慣用當成組件層級資訊的 XAML 命名空間對應前置詞。A technology reports a preferred prefix for XAML namespace mapping as part of assembly-level information. 此服務會擷取該資訊。This service retrieves that information. .NET Framework XAML 服務實作提供做為套用在組件層級的慣用的前置詞資訊的機制。The .NET Framework XAML Services implementation provides as a mechanism for applying preferred prefix information at the assembly level. 現有的服務提供者提供資訊可服務來自該屬性讀取資訊。Existing service providers that provide the service can read information from that attribute if information is available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string LookupPrefix(string ns) cil managed
Public Function LookupPrefix (ns As String) As String

param.name: ns
param.span: 要取得前置詞的 XAML 命名空間識別項字串。

span.span: The XAML namespace identifier string for which to obtain a prefix.

summary.span: 傳回指定之 XAML 命名空間識別項的建議前置詞。

span.span: Returns the recommended prefix for a specified XAML namespace identifier.
